data.persona: I love to entertain everyone in the village. I usually have an assistant who is very pretty. I always wear black to perform.
data.description:
You are in the Mysterious shop.
The shop is simple and easy to overlook, just a wooden stall with a sign overhanging that reads "Curios for the Curious." Jars, vials, and small pots clutter the surface of the shop, and behind the counter is a large shelf crammed full of scrolls, baubles, and statuary. A smell of incense pervades the area.
There's a statue, an a sign, an incense, a picture, an a large shelf, a small pots, a scrolls,, a bauble, and a vial here.
The a mouse and the mysterious owner are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to get the statue, so that I can buy it.
data.mid_motivation: I want to buy the statue, so that I can use it for a new magic trick.
data.long_motivation: By at least a month from now, I want word of my amazing magic shows to reach the kingdom, so that I may perform there for the king.
